Wild Rose Stimulating Botanical Toner, Refreshing

Brand: Wild

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Hamamelis virginiana distillate, Jasminum officinale (jasmine) extract, Mentha piperita (peppermint) essential oil, Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) essential oil, Citrus limon (lemon) essential oil, Daucus carota (carrot) essential oil

Ingr

essential oil

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
